title: Kylie Minogue dazzles in a polka dot puffball mini dress as she performs at Louis Vuitton afterparty
text:
She never disappoints the crowds at her shows.

So Kylie Minogue ensured she put on a stellar performance as she hit the stage at an after party celebrating the re-opening of a Louis Vuitton store at Annabel's in London on Wednesday.

The pop princess, 51, looked in high spirits as she threw her arms up in the air whilst surrounded by handsome male backing dancers.

Chic: Kylie Minogue ensured she put on a stellar performance as she hit the stage at an after party celebrating the re-opening of a Louis Vuitton store at Annabel's in London on Wednesday

The blonde bombshell cut a stylish figure in a polka dot mini dress with a puffball hem that offered a look at her tanned and toned pins.

The Australian singer added to the glamour by donning a delicate silver necklace and styling her glossy golden locks in loose waves.

Earlier in the night, Kylie had attended the event in an electric blue ensemble that appeared to be a homage to the bold style of the Eighties.

Working her angles: The pop princess, 51, looked in high spirits as she threw her arms up in the air whilst surrounded by handsome male backing dancers

Her outfit featured a high neckline with silver sun embellishments down the collar and across the waist of her top.

Her blouse also had pleated detail and long billowy sleeves tapered down at the arms with black cuffs.

She accentuated her waist with a belt and a large silver square buckle that drew attention down to her satin skirt.

Step back in time! Earlier in the night, Kylie had attended the event in an electric blue ensemble that appeared to be a homage to the bold style of the Eighties

Ready to party: Her outfit featured a high neckline with silver sun embellishments down the collar and across the waist of her top

Kylie continued the silver accents in her outfit by accessorising with matching heels and earrings.

The blonde beauty kept her makeup simple to show off her flawless complexion - with just mascara, glossy lips and light blue eyeliner.

Kylie recently wished her younger sister Dannii a happy 48th birthday, sharing their childhood photos growing up in Melbourne.

In the caption she said her 'mind floods with so many memories from making fun and games out of nothing'.

Trip down memory lane: Kylie recently wished her younger sister Dannii a happy 48th birthday, sharing their childhood photos growing up in Melbourne

'Our connecting wardrobes when we were teens, all the hours you put in to work at such a young age and you, me and our brother Brendan all being so fortunate to have our family and each other,' Kylie reminisced.

'I could go on and on!!! In short, I love you and I'm so proud of you Mama!!! Happy Birthday!' she continued, alongside photos of themselves in their younger years.

In one picture, the pair were dressed in school uniforms with their hair tied in pigtails.

While another saw Kylie and Dannii with roller skates on and seated on a front porch.
description: She never disappoints the crowds at her shows.  So Kylie ensured she put on a stellar performance as she hit the stage at an after party celebrating the re-opening of a Louis Vuitton store at Annabel's.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
